scope="row"| "Drowning" |2019 |Kučka | - |Co- producer | - |Kučka |} ==Essential Mix== Flume appeared on the BBC Radio 1 Essential Mix show on 3 October 2015, about six months before the release of his second studio album, Skin. The mix featured his own music and tracks from electronic artists including Jon Hopkins, Amon Tobin, and Jamie xx, as well as hip hop artists Knxwledge, Vic Mensa, Vince Staples, and Kanye West. == Music videos == {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- !scope="col" | Title !scope="col" | Year !scope="col" | Director(s) |- !scope="row"|"I Met You" (Anna Lunoe and Flume) |rowspan="2"|2012 |Melvin J.
